subtitles: 264112 265781 That's all right. I can help you.

353618 355495 and they was up 10 minutes ago.

364671 368091 We make our books like we make

368175 369968 I'll take care of it when I get back.

370052 372179 See that you do. Only thing

372262 374556 in this joint, pal,

401166 403919 No days off for good behavior.

522329 526333 A rather crude experiment...

536635 540305 He had been grappling

559157 561743 to think of me

826799 828468 Aw, go on, get out of here.

860458 862585 to expire at a good time of night.

1023871 1025331 No, I never take it off.

1098529 1102116 If we did...

1469650 1472319 so I assume I live here.

1480619 1483789 don't know who I am, do you?

1517823 1520075 I know. I saw the papers.

1537009 1539553 I guess I wanted to test myself.

1543599 1548187 Maybe I have lost my mind, but whoever

1563827 1566580 The car outside,

1566664 1568958 It's a cop.

1580261 1582179 Wait. You have the wrong man.

1589103 1590663 I'll listen to whatever

1590729 1592606 You're not gonna believe

1597027 1600114 There's this--this group of men.

1612668 1615421 No one ever listens to me.

1676273 1678984 All you gotta do is take

1683572 1687159 You know, that's funny.

1687242 1689536 if it's Main Street west

1697795 1699588 but I am running late

1710182 1712434 There's just one thing

1717231 1719858 Murdoch doesn't strike me as one.

1732663 1734623 Well, maybe you could

1738669 1741964 You are a fastidious man, driven.
1744883 1746802 I would say your life is...

1813285 1815954 You know how uncomfortable

1821585 1824171 I was frightened.

1824254 1828050 Your weakness is not, we think,

1828133 1830761 We found this in his hotel room.

1830844 1834723 Must we reproduce

1835933 1838077 but he woke up, he knocked the syringe

1838101 1840145 I tried to stop him but he was too fast.

1841438 1844733 Only fragments.

1844816 1848570 I--I guess it's only a matter

1854326 1857079 But that's impossible.

1861500 1863210 Of course. I'll imprint him again.

1863293 1867798 No. We require them

1871134 1873554 We'll talk again

1891905 1895409 Perhaps some exercise

1940996 1944333 I've been looking through

1947586 1952382 The kind that can make

1953717 1956011 Yeah, I was on that case.

1962267 1966355 I've just been spending time

1972110 1973987 I've been over every inch

1992839 1994299 As much as the next guy.

2023995 2026998 Something to do with the case.

2101281 2104451 The recollections of a great lover?

2115128 2119508 Not the sort of conquests

2138652 2140862 a tragic death in the family.
2154459 2156294 during the tuning as the others do?

2160549 2163385 A--A freak of nature.

2166888 2169391 That's the purpose

2169474 2172769 That's why you keep changing people

2172853 2175897 Maybe you have finally found

2175981 2177208 and it's going

2181152 2184739 It requires several of your lifetimes

2279292 2280543 You think you've got it tough?

2280627 2282504 You try looking after these kids,

2283421 2287550 Anyways, Frederickson says he'll

2603449 2607078 Probably have maid's quarters

2665136 2667263 That's no way to greet

2672477 2674812 Shh. Please keep your voice down.

2674896 2676832 Why can't I remember anything?

2683237 2684614 I don't care.

2695666 2698753 My God. You really can do it.

2700171 2702382 Listen to me, John.

2702465 2704509 You can make things happen

2704592 2707845 They call it tuning. That is how they make

2713393 2715686 Let me help you, John.

2715770 2717355 We can take the city back.

2772910 2775538 He made a terrible

2777999 2780835 So I simply told Frederickson

2780918 2783629 And well you should have, darling.
2786299 2787550 I don't know where he has gone.

2865169 2871759 ♪ If you are true to me ♪

2911424 2915803 The first subject

2915886 2918347 Mr. Book. There is a--a problem.

2934864 2939368 So we must become like him.

3054316 3057737 "I found this postcard

3181402 3183779 but instead we have

3187908 3191287 and we must follow

3210681 3214268 how my wife had hurt me

3219023 3222526 I would look for a way

3226196 3228532 - Leave me alone with her.

3257269 3258687 How come that train didn't stop?
3261607 3263484 There's no way out, you know?

3263567 3266487 You can't get out of the city.

3269698 3271408 The one they've been looking for.

3271492 3273327 - Who are you?
- Used to be a cop.
3274036 3276497 At least, in this life, I was.

3279541 3281335 Then they swap them around

3281418 3284046 I've seen them do it.

3284129 3286173 till no one knows

3286256 3287508 How do you know all this?

3291929 3294139 It's not supposed to happen,

3296266 3298185 They'll come looking for you, Murdoch.
3299311 3300938 Just like they'll come looking for me.
3320541 3322835 This was to be his home.
3325587 3327381 That was when we loved her.
3327464 3329299 This is all well and good, Mr. Hand...

3329383 3333887 But we require a more practical link

3339059 3341395 And I know where to find her.

3349236 3352114 We're very lucky,

3353240 3357494 To be able to revisit those places

3358328 3360372 I thought it was more

3368881 3370561 in which your memories

3370632 3374178 but those shared

3379266 3381727 no experiences to call your own.

3403916 3407044 Lit up like a floating birthday cake.

3419973 3422810 I met my wife at this place.
3422893 3424645 It's where I first met my husband.

3551688 3553774 Ah ha ha ha ha ha!
3573919 3575921 Shell Beach is where I grew up?

3593939 3596858 The old cracker barrel

3606076 3608453 You were always scribbling

3608996 3611581 That's me and your pa. Ha!

3645907 3648493 You burnt your arm

3678648 3680942 He told me he wanted

3695707 3699503 I wanted to talk to her. I thought maybe

3700712 3703173 Stay here.

3714518 3719648 Yeah, this is Bumstead. Send the

3819915 3823168 It was a gift from my mother.

3837057 3839434 I can't remember

3841978 3844981 How do you think I could

3856326 3858995 I'm not sure I know anymore.
3862541 3865085 I left your old room like it was.
3865168 3867254 You can sleep here tonight, huh?
3867337 3869589 Glad to have you back, Johnny...
3869673 3871299 even if it is for just a night.

3885188 3886856 What happened to the day?

3891278 3894864 get some sleep. We'll straighten

3953715 3955592 Keep him there,

3963600 3965101 We just have to play it as it comes.

3984120 3986581 Haven't seen you in so long.

4074461 4076421 The city's ours. We made it.

4078047 4081176 We fashioned this city

4081259 4085054 different eras, different pasts

4085138 4087599 Each night, we revise it, refine it...

4285380 4286839 I am not telling you lies!

4332427 4334637 I just mean... during the day.

4338391 4342103 And I'm not talking about some distant,

for this somewhere.
4421724 4423518 I never meant to hurt you, John...

4423601 4424745 and I did it,
and I don't know why I did.
4424769 4426896 I wish I could take it all back.
4426979 4429482 No. Emma... You didn't do it.

4429565 4432276 This... affair of yours,
whatever it is...

4432360 4433960 the thing you're
supposed to have done...

4434028 4435881 you didn't do it.
I don't believe it ever happened.
4437365 4439659 I know this is gonna sound crazy...

4439742 4442662 but what if we never
knew each other before now?
4442745 4445081 What if the first time we ever met...

4445164 4448960 was last night in your--
in our apartment...

4452004 4454841 and everything that I'm supposed
to remember never really happened?
4454924 4457468 Someone just wants us to think it did.
4462640 4465017 You know, back in the apartment...

4465810 4468271 I suddenly felt like
I didn't know you at all.
4470064 4472567 It was as if you were a stranger.
4474819 4476571 But how can that be true?
4477155 4481242 I so vividly remember meeting you.
4481325 4484370 I remember falling in love with you.
4506017 4508728 You can't fake something like that.

4547141 4550895 I--Um... kind of thought
you should know.

4553522 4556192 Oh, and...
the chief wanted to see you.
4564617 4566619 I knew you'd track the killer down, sir.
4596565 4597650 How can we help you, sir?

4622550 4626137 I wanted to be the first
to congratulate you... about the case.

4664759 4667399 Don't you think it's about time
you started giving me some answers?

4676645 4679065 It's one of the few places
I'm allowed a moment's peace.

4679148 4682485 You--You see,
they have an aversion to--to water.

4683652 4686072 One could almost call it a phobia.
Ha ha ha ha.

4686155 4689408 Who are they?
What do they want from me?
4691077 4693079 Well, for now, let's just say...

4693162 4695831 that you were the subject
of their experiment.
4702296 4704006 And you are not a murderer.
4705966 4707676 I'm sorry about this. I truly am.
4707760 4709261 But we do not have much time...

4709345 4711931 and I cannot afford the luxury
of doing this the right way.

4713557 4715851 all the answers
are in this syringe.
4715935 4717135 I need you to inject yourself.

4717186 4719522 It's the only way to
make you understand.

4720940 4723901 We're running out of time, John.
You have to do this now.

4726028 4728406 Inspector, he is more
disturbed than we thought.

4728489 4731158 I may not be the judge of personality
that you are, Doctor...

4731242 4734203 but you're the one
who looks disturbed to me.

4735121 4736914 You do not know
what you are doing.
4738124 4741710 What, exactly is in this... Doctor?

4743462 4745631 All the answers you've
been looking for, John.

4748342 4753347 Guess I'll just have to
hold on to it for... safekeeping.

4757393 4762731 - Go? Where are we going?
- Shell Beach.
4763816 4766110 That's where you want to go, isn't it?
4780040 4781625 What do you hope to gain by helping me?

4784044 4786964 None of these maps extend far enough
to show the ocean.

4788466 4790342 I promise you!
I've been there, and--

4790426 4792970 If you've been there,
you can show us the way, then, can't you?

4798934 4801687 I refuse.
You--You can't make me go there!

4827838 4831383 I don't understand.
Used to be a bridge here.

4838140 4839743 Try that again,
your friends are gonna be...
4839767 4841060 fishing you out of the canal.

4841143 4842537 Just don't hurt me.
I'll tell you everything.

4861872 4866418 We will give you some more
pretty things soon... Anna.
4875928 4878806 I have another use for her first.

4885521 4890734 First there was darkness.
Then came the strangers.

4892903 4895197 They abducted us
and brought us here.

4900703 4903539 They mix and match
our memories as they see fit...

4903622 4906375 trying to divine
what makes us unique.

4907084 4909795 One day, a man
might be an inspector.

4912881 4916135 When they want to
study a murderer for instance...

4916218 4920014 they simply imprint one of their citizens
with a new personality...

4921140 4925144 arrange a family for him,
friends, an entire history...

4930691 4934737 Will a man, given the history
of a killer, continue in that vein?

4934820 4938782 Or are we, in fact, more
than the mere sum of our memories?

4938866 4943829 This business of you being a killer
was an unhappy coincidence.

4943912 4946707 You have had dozens
of lives before now.

4946790 4950127 You just happened to wake up
while I was imprinting you with this one.
4950919 4953005 Why are they doing all of this?
4953088 4956425 It is our capacity for individuality...

4956508 4959011 our souls that makes
us different from them.

4959094 4961430 They think they
can find the human soul...

4961513 4964600 if they understand
how our memories work.

4970356 4973734 Their entire race
is on the brink of extinction.
4973817 4975653 They think we can save them.

4975736 4978155 - Where do I fit in?
- You are different, John.

4978781 4981617 You resisted my attempt
to imprint you.

4986288 4989625 Somehow you have developed
their ability to tune.
4989708 4990948 That is how they change things.
4991001 4992503 That is how they built this city.

4992586 4995464 They have machines buried deep
beneath the surface...

4995547 4999468 that allow them
to focus their telepathic energies.

5000344 5002763 They control everything here,
even the sun.

5002846 5006183 That's why it's always dark.
They can't stand the light.
5006266 5007476 So why do they need you?

5007559 5011897 When they first brought us here,
they extracted what was in us.

5011980 5015776 So they could store the information,
remix it like so much paint...

5015859 5018362 and give us back new memories
of their choosing.

5018445 5022074 But they still needed an artist
to help them.

5023909 5027037 I understood the intricacies
of the human mind...

5029665 5032376 so they allowed me
to keep my skills as a scientist...

5033919 5036380 But they made me
delete everything else.

5044763 5047558 Can you imagine what
it is like being forced...

5049393 5052730 What about my past?
What about my childhood?
5059319 5061155 This was blank when I found it!

5063323 5066452 You were never a boy...
not in this place.

5066535 5069288 Your entire history is an illusion,
a fabrication...
5069371 5071206 as it is with all of us.

5071290 5073751 You made those drawings
happen with your gift.
5073834 5075711 You say they brought us here.
5164758 5168846 There is nothing beyond the city.
5223150 5225319 And now you know the truth.

5293929 5296807 You'll allow yourself
to surrender, Mr. Murdoch...

5296890 5299059 or it will result in
this one's death, yes?

5299142 5301645 What do I care?
She's not my real wife!

5302896 5307067 But you do still care,
don't you, Mr. Murdoch?

5307150 5309778 You see, I have
become the monster...

5313657 5317577 Shall I end her life now
as you would have?

5374760 5377637 The doctor was right.
He has evolved.

5393320 5397741 Dangerous. But he can also
lead us to what we seek.
5397824 5401161 What the doctor calls the soul.

5401244 5404915 It is time for our experiment
to move into a final phase.

5404998 5407667 We no longer need
the other subjects.
5407751 5411338 The time for study is over.

5411421 5415634 It is time to be one
with John Murdoch.

5450669 5455215 They want to imprint you
with their own collective memories.

5456550 5460679 They want to make you one of them,
so they can share your soul.
5471064 5474067 The pain will only last a moment.

5488123 5490043 You'll rise to greater
heights than that, my boy.

5490125 5491918 One day when you're older,
you'll understand.

5499009 5502179 SCHREBER: Now remember
what I told you. Never talk to strangers.

5504097 5506892 You're probably wondering why I keep
appearing in your memories.

5506975 5509477 It is because I have
inserted myself in them.

5509561 5511605 All of these memories
have been fabricated...
5511688 5513356 to teach you about the strangers.

5513440 5516568 Give you a lifetime of knowledge
in a single syringe.
5533335 5535378 You're getting the hang of it, John.

5535462 5537505 Maybe one day
I'll be working for you.

5538340 5541509 This is the machine the strangers use
to amplify their thoughts.
5543511 5545013 You must take control of it.
5545096 5546681 You must make the machine yours.
5546765 5548850 I know you can beat them, John.
5563365 5566076 There is no time for romance, John.
5566159 5568453 The world can be what you make it.

5570580 5573083 You have the power
to make anything happen...
5859536 5860954 I knew you could do it, John.
5867168 5869921 She is not Emma anymore, John.
5871464 5873091 So give her back her memories.

5873174 5875593 I can't. The facility
where the strangers...
5880890 5883601 What are you going to do now, John?

5885353 5889148 You told me I had
the power, didn't you?

5889524 5892026 I can make these machines
do anything I want.

5893695 5896030 Make this world anything
I want it to be.

5897031 5900076 Just so long as I concentrate
hard enough.
5984952 5986329 DR. SCHREBER: Where are you going?

6093936 6097273 I'm just making a few little changes
around here, is all.
6097356 6099066 Are we sure that's what we want?
6099567 6101986 I'm prepared to take my chances.

6103571 6106574 Your imprint is not
agreeable with my kind.

6108034 6110286 But I wanted to know
what it was like...

6113206 6115833 You know how I was
supposed to feel.

6119754 6123466 You wanted to know what it was
about us that made us human.

6124842 6128179 Well, you're not going
to find it... in here.

6129931 6132558 You went looking
in the wrong place.

6245546 6248341 Do you know if Shell Beach
is around here?
6248424 6251052 I think that's it just over there.
6273240 6275242 Would you like to join me?
6590349 6594645 ♪ Like a lazy ocean hugs the shore ♪

6599900 6603988 ♪ Like a flower
bending in the breeze ♪

6609410 6613664 ♪ When we dance
you have a way with me ♪
6618669 6623382 ♪ Other dancers may be on the floor ♪
6623465 6628137 ♪ Dear, but my eyes will see only you ♪
6632933 6637521 ♪ When we sway I go weak ♪
